A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I sat watching it struggling to think of a comparison\, then it hit me (I think It was during one of the five or six times the film could have decently ended). It is Quantum of Solace - an expensive\, noisy incoherent and disappointing follow-up to a powerful and effective re-boot. I've got no objection to the way it busted expectations and laughed at all our pre-conceptions. I just object to it being a never-ending parade of illogical piffle. And what on earth was the point of that whole \"master codebreaker\" nonsense? Is Rian Johnson a fan of \"Setting Free the Bears\"? I hate to say it\, but the whole film had a nasty spell of prequel about it.  Its worth one star for effort\, but that's it I'm afraid. I think I'm done with Star Wars now. It's been a fun 40 years but everything has to end sometime.
